press_button.description: Press the coffee machine button to start the brewing process.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the coffee quantity or intensity.

pick_container.description: Pick the container to clean or refill.

place_container.description: Place the container back into its slot after cleaning or refilling.

open_lid.description: Open the lid to add coffee ground or water.

close_lid.description: Close the lid after adding the coffee ground or water.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to keep it neat and tidy.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it can function well.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the coffee machine body, button, lid, knob, and container.
